insured.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if someone or something is insured, there is insurance relating to them
insured.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I’m not insured to drive Anne’s car.
insured.translation[1].definitions[0].de: used in insurance contracts to talk about the person, organization etc that is insured
insured.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: This section also covers cancellation of a holiday where the insured decides to cancel.
insured.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: The Swiss remain the world’s most insured people, outspending Japanese and Americans on premiums.
There were few pilots at that time who were insured to undertake such a flight.
We insist that you are insured against accidents.
